Mobile Portal

Mobile Portal is a simple application for creating mobile-friendly homepage with your favourite bookmarks. Site Admin can customize the appearance of the Portal (different skins, layouts, fonts, icons, colors, company logo etc.) and group the bookmarks in categories.

Type of work:

UX Design UI Design Frontend Development Backend Development

The application was a result of my Ruby on Rails education, so I was the author of the product concept as well as full stack developer.

Technologies:
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • Javascript
  • jQuery
  • RubyonRails
